title: Topic 003 Question 038
body: You have a Microsoft 365 E5 subscription that contains a Microsoft SharePoint Online site named Site1. Site1 contains a file named File1.
You have a retention policy named Retention1 that has the following settings:
•	Retention items for a specific period
o	At the end of the retention period: Delete items automatically
You need to ensure that File1 is deleted automatically after seven years. The solution must NOT affect the retention of other files on Site1.
options: Move File1 to a new folder and configure the access control list (ACL) entries for File1.
Create and publish a new retention label.
Move File1 to a new folder and list the excluded locations for Retention1.
